name: TMC
short_description:
This is not necessarily compatible, I have no idea how they did it, but I found out about rsync and discovered that it could be made into a Time Machine like backup system.

But I had to make some additions that made sure the backups don't get out of control.  So I put in limits for each backup set.  How many backups for a set, how old the backups are and how big the set was were the constraints, but allowing for a minimum age and number kept from inadvertently deleting all backups too.

This is still in progress...
summary: This is a clone of Mac's Time Machine Backup Server.
